channel.title: Covid 19 on Michael Harper
channel.description: Recent content in Covid 19 on Michael Harper

item.title: UK goes into lockdown: further Covid-19 analysis
item.description: On 23rd March, the UK introduced unprecedent measures to lockdown the country in the wake of the continuing Covid-19 outbreak. This followed a week of slowly escalating measures all designed to increase the amount of social distancing and reduce the spread of the virus. This article dives into some of the statistics available for this week and provide some more context for readers going further into the crisis.

item.title: Visualising Covid-19 With Animated, Static and Interactive Maps
item.description:
About

I have reflecting on the unprecedented week in the UK. Even this time last week, the country seemed fairly laid back as government advice was largely to continue with business as usual. It is all very different to now, with schools set to close on Monday and most people either working from home or not working at all.
